      public void collision(String[][] map)
      Player Collision Control
      Parameters:

    • platform

      public int platform(String[][] map, int x, int y)
      Method to return how far away the player is from a platform
      Parameters:
      map - to see how close the crate is to platforms
      x - where the crate is relative to the map on the x-axis
      y - where the crate is relative to the map on the y-axis

    • collisionHandler

      public String collisionHandler(guns.Bullet b)
      Implementation of collisionHandler to manage bullet location plus collision, checking to see if the sides of the player and bullet overlap
      Parameters:
      b - gets the bullets's size and location in order to determine a square for the collision
      Returns:
      boolean returns true if the player is overlapping with the bullet, and false if not

    • collisionHandler

      public boolean collisionHandler(guns.Crate c)
      Implementation of collisionHandler to manage crate location plus collision, checking to see if the sides of the player and crate overlap
      Parameters:
      c - gets the crate's size and location in order to determine a square for the collision
      Returns:
      boolean returns true if the player is overlapping with the crate, and false if not

      public boolean getDead()
      Returns true if the player is off the map
      Returns:
